00057 using System;
00058 using System.Collections.Generic;
00059 
00060 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00061 {
00065     public class AkimaSplineInterpolation :
00066         IInterpolationMethod
00067     {
00068         CubicHermiteSplineInterpolation _hermiteSpline;
00069 
00073         public
00074         AkimaSplineInterpolation()
00075         {
00076             _hermiteSpline = new CubicHermiteSplineInterpolation();
00077         }
00078 
00083         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00084         {
00085             get { return _hermiteSpline.SupportsDifferentiation; }
00086         }
00087 
00092         public bool SupportsIntegration
00093         {
00094             get { return _hermiteSpline.SupportsIntegration; }
00095         }
00096 
00102         public
00103         void
00104         Init(
00105             IList<double> t,
00106             IList<double> x
00107             )
00108         {
00109             if(null == t)
00110             {
00111                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00112             }
00113 
00114             if(null == x)
00115             {
00116                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00117             }
00118 
00119             if(t.Count < 5)
00120             {
00121                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("t");
00122             }
00123 
00124             if(t.Count != x.Count)
00125             {
00126                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentVectorsSameLengths, "x");
00127             }
00128 
00129             int n = t.Count;
00130 
00131             double[] tt = new double[n];
00132             t.CopyTo(tt, 0);
00133             double[] xx = new double[n];
00134             x.CopyTo(xx, 0);
00135 
00136             Sorting.Sort(tt, xx);
00137 
00138             // Prepare W (weights), Diff (divided differences)
00139 
00140             double[] w = new double[n - 1];
00141             double[] diff = new double[n - 1];
00142 
00143             for(int i = 0; i < diff.Length; i++)
00144             {
00145                 diff[i] = (xx[i + 1] - xx[i]) / (tt[i + 1] - tt[i]);
00146             }
00147 
00148             for(int i = 1; i < w.Length; i++)
00149             {
00150                 w[i] = Math.Abs(diff[i] - diff[i - 1]);
00151             }
00152 
00153             // Prepare Hermite interpolation scheme
00154 
00155             double[] d = new double[n];
00156 
00157             for(int i = 2; i < d.Length - 2; i++)
00158             {
00159                 if(!Number.AlmostZero(w[i - 1]) || !Number.AlmostZero(w[i + 1]))
00160                 {
00161                     d[i] = (w[i + 1] * diff[i - 1] + w[i - 1] * diff[i]) / (w[i + 1] + w[i - 1]);
00162                 }
00163                 else
00164                 {
00165                     d[i] = ((tt[i + 1] - tt[i]) * diff[i - 1] + (tt[i] - tt[i - 1]) * diff[i]) / (tt[i + 1] - tt[i - 1]);
00166                 }
00167             }
00168 
00169             d[0] = DifferentiateThreePoint(tt[0], tt[0], xx[0], tt[1], xx[1], tt[2], xx[2]);
00170             d[1] = DifferentiateThreePoint(tt[1], tt[0], xx[0], tt[1], xx[1], tt[2], xx[2]);
00171             d[n - 2] = DifferentiateThreePoint(tt[n - 2], tt[n - 3], xx[n - 3], tt[n - 2], xx[n - 2], tt[n - 1], xx[n - 1]);
00172             d[n - 1] = DifferentiateThreePoint(tt[n - 1], tt[n - 3], xx[n - 3], tt[n - 2], xx[n - 2], tt[n - 1], xx[n - 1]);
00173 
00174             // Build Akima spline using Hermite interpolation scheme
00175 
00176             _hermiteSpline.InitInternal(tt, xx, d);
00177         }
00178 
00184         public
00185         double
00186         Interpolate(
00187             double t
00188             )
00189         {
00190             return _hermiteSpline.Interpolate(t);
00191         }
00192 
00200         public
00201         double
00202         Differentiate(
00203             double t,
00204             out double first,
00205             out double second
00206             )
00207         {
00208             return _hermiteSpline.Differentiate(t, out first, out second);
00209         }
00210 
00217         public
00218         double
00219         Integrate(
00220             double t
00221             )
00222         {
00223             return _hermiteSpline.Integrate(t);
00224         }
00225 
00236         static
00237         double
00238         DifferentiateThreePoint(
00239             double t,
00240             double t0,
00241             double x0,
00242             double t1,
00243             double x1,
00244             double t2,
00245             double x2
00246             )
00247         {
00248             // TODO: Optimization potential, but keep numeric stability in mind!
00249             t = t - t0;
00250             t1 = t1 - t0;
00251             t2 = t2 - t0;
00252             double a = (x2 - x0 - t2 / t1 * (x1 - x0)) / (t2 * t2 - t1 * t2);
00253             double b = (x1 - x0 - a * t1 * t1) / t1;
00254             return 2 * a * t + b;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 }
